name: Minigame Mix
description:
Random Levels, Random Characters, Random Experience!

Play Over 75 Levels Combinations in this Random Game!

Controls:

Up, Right, Left and Down

Characters:

Jumper - Platformer

Boing - Can't Stop Jumping

Slug - Has a Portal Gun (Use Up to Shoot)

UFO - 8 Directions

Car - Can't Change the Direction

Made for the GMTK2022 - Theme Roll the Dice (Using a Random System)
